description: I was the lead developer for Abstract Realm. Working closely with the team, I built the project website, minting dApp, and provided advice for the project in terms of development.
I built an NFT minting dapp where users can mint NFTs from the Johnny collection on the Rinkeby Testnet Ethereum Blockchain.
I built a simple CRUD task manager app using the MERN stack. In this app, users are able to view their tasks, create new tasks, update and delete them.
I built an exact clone of the Apple website homepage from scratch through technologies such as React.js, Bootstrap and vanilla CSS.
